title: PLEASE HELP Can't Buy Champs?!?!?!
body: i have 5000 ip but i cant buy a 4800 champ. PLEASE HELP

replies.body:
Can you try making the purchase through the *Legacy Client?* You can access this from the login screen if you're using the Beta Client:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

I hope this worked for you!
It worked! Thank you so much!
